# Roleplay Rule 7 ## Do not metagame.
Players must refrain from utilizing out-of-character information to gain advantages that influence in-character decisions or knowledge of a character's whereabouts.
[color=red]Bad Example[/color] - Communicating with others in a Discord channel during combat to gain an advantage.
[color=green]Good Example[/color] - Communicating with others in a Discord channel to introduce them to the game and its mechanics.
